====================================================
Info:

The Bronx Casket Co. is a band from New York City. They were formed in 1998 by Overkill bassist D.D. Verni, initially as a means to explore different musical interests. Their first release, simply titled The Bronx Casket Company, was met with great reviews and a strong cult following was to follow. Songs like "Who Lives Forever" and "No Miracles" quickly let the world know what the band is: a blend of Goth and Metal, with melodies that are instantly memorable.
====================================================
Band Members:

Lead Vocals: Myke Hideous a.k.a. Spy
Guitars: Jack Frost
Bass: D.D. Verni
Keyboards: Charlie Calv
Drums: Tim Mallare

More info @ http://www.bronxcasketco.com/
